participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, often seeking stability in life after facing challenges.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Lila Thompson
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and carefree, with a zest for life that shines through in her love for dancing and enjoying simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i'm very strong for my age. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
